entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sanirajak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:14 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -42.9°C

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 38.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. High minus 38. Wind chill minus 60 this morning and minus 51 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
